name: .FF File Extension
summary: Learn about .FF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game data file used by Call of Duty (CoD) first-person shooter games, including Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare and Call of Duty: Black Ops; saves various game data that are loaded during gameplay.

content: NOTE: FF files use a proprietary format and are not intended to be modified by players. Changing the contents of an FF file may cause the game to stop running.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
